page.title: 11GOWY VALLEY RECREATION
page.content: Ballet, Popmobility, Yoga, Speech, Drama, Whist, Badminton, Golf, Darts & Domino Leagues, Tug of War teams, Cricket, Football, Horse riding, Fishing and Amateur & CB radio. Citizens Band Radio, legalised in 1981 using 40 FM channels is used both at home and in cars & trucks. It is used as a means of communicating between both friends and other enthusiasts. A channel is kept free for emergencies. {MEDIA}Monthly Parish magazines, Guilden Sutton bi-monthly magazine (Marigold), "My Guilden Sutton" by A.R. Willis, "Thesis on Guilden Sutton" by Dr. Arthur and "Barrow" by Barrow Local History Group.
